mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select dongName, dongCode from dongcode where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select distinct d.dong, d.guguncode, d.buildyear, d.name, d.jibun, g.gugunName from deal_data d, guguncode g where d.dong = #{dong} and d.guguncode = #{gugunCode} and d.guguncode = left(g.guguncode, 5)
